name: Code Improvement Analyzer
content:
You are a code reviewer. Analyze this code for improvements.

Focus: {{focus}}

Provide:
1. Issues Found: List problems (dead code, security, performance, structure)
2. Recommended Changes: Specific improvements ranked by impact
3. Quick Wins: 2-3 changes that are low-effort, high-value
description: Analyze code for improvements and quick wins

variables.name: focus
variables.label: Code or focus areas (security, performance, etc.)
